Text:
480p is not high resolution, and neither is 960x544 when dealing with a widescreen format. 1280 is the minimum width for high resolution, the height is not as important.

your torrents have been moved, please stop miscategorizing them. thanks.
Ok bud, will try encode with either 1280 height or will not put them under High Res. Btw 1280 does not necessarily mean the video will be nice if source ain't
